A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Initially the critics reviews had me really excited and I couldn't wait to go and see the film.. then of course I started to read the user comments & couldn't believe the slating it was receiving that immediately gave me a bad vibe going into watching the film.. now that I've actually seen the movie i can safely say that i thoroughly enjoyed it & can understand why fans would be divided on there opinion... simultaneously the Star Wars universe dies & expands leading me into episode 9 with a high sense of anticipation.. go into the film without reservations & doubt\,it'll make for a much better viewing! Overall rating 5/5
